attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson has been bias in his governments handling of the pandemic. Matt Hancock having an affair, whilst families have to livestream funerals of loved ones, Dominic Cummings travelling over 200 miles to Durham - but the matter was considered closed to the Prime Minister.

Boris failed to put travel bans and restrictions in place which meant new variants had time to spread and more travellers were able to freely enter the country. Costing more lives.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
